scripts.dev: cp tools/index.dev.html app/index.html && cp tools/authSuccess.html app/authSuccess.html && rollup -cwm
scripts.release: rm -f app/sculptgl.js.map && cp tools/index.release.html app/index.html && cp tools/authSuccess.html app/authSuccess.html && rollup -c --environment release
scripts.buildElectron: npm run release && rm -rf standalone/app/ && cp -R app/ standalone/ && cp package.json standalone
scripts.standalone: npm run buildElectron && cd standalone && node buildStandalone.js
scripts.dev-win: copy /Y tools\index.dev.html app\index.html && copy /Y tools\authSuccess.html app\authSuccess.html && start rollup -cwm && node server.js
scripts.release-win: copy /Y tools\index.release.html app\index.html && copy /Y tools\authSuccess.html app\authSuccess.html && rollup -c --environment release
scripts.buildElectron-win: npm run release-win && robocopy app\ standalone\app\ /e  && copy /Y package.json standalone\
scripts.standalone-win: npm run buildElectron-win && cd standalone && node buildStandalone.js
